details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.1 General - Metadata key in the Catalog
details.description: The Catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key whose value is a metadata stream as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.3.2.

rule.description: The Catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key whose value is a metadata stream as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.3.2.

error.message: The document catalog dictionary doesn't contain metadata key.
